meanings.sent1: She is the sneeziest person in our family.
meanings.sent2: Out of all of us, she is the sneeziest when it comes to allergies.
meanings.sent3: During the flower festival, she was crowned the sneeziest princess due to her constant sneezing.
meanings.sent4: Her nose was like the sneeziest volcano, erupting with sneezes every few minutes.
meanings.sent5: Her sneezes were the sneeziest, echoing through the house like thunder.

meanings.sent1: He is the sneeziest person I know; he sneezes at the slightest hint of dust.
meanings.sent2: Among all my friends, he is the sneeziest whenever we visit a pet store.
meanings.sent3: At the comedy show, he was voted the sneeziest audience member for his loud sneezes at every joke.
meanings.sent4: His nose seemed to have a built-in sneeziest alarm, going off whenever he encountered pollen.
meanings.sent5: His sneezes were the sneeziest, making everyone around him jump in surprise.
